storyInfo: The Doctor is taken into captivity at the Paleroches'. Enciodes and Gnosis break off relations. Undercurrents rush through all sides, and the situation turns and turns.

attributes.content: Now that this is settled, the three clans must start liaising frequently with one another.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: We must further discuss the specific of the transfer of powers to the Saintess and what powers each family is allowed to keep.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: However, aside from this, the preparations the three of us must make for the ritual are equally important.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Therefore, with the upcoming ceremony, I propose we seize the occasion and transfer our powers to the Saintess at the same time.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The ceremony and the transfer of powers are managed by different individuals. As such, both can be conducted at the same time. What's more, the ceremony also calls for the participation of the clan leaders. What do you think of the idea, if I may so ask?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: The decision has been made. It will happen in due course.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: This year's ceremony will also be a ceremony for the transfer of powers to the Saintess, huh? Guess we have something to look forward to.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: In that case, I will have my men draft the relevant documents and distribute them across Kjerag.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I am sure the masses will be rejoiced to learn of this.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You can't hoodwink your way out of this, Enciodes. Who will manage the valleys and the mines the next few days? Gnosis was in charge, but you had him fired. Who will take care of all that?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You needn't worry, Arctosz.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I hired an expert from outside Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: This expert will conduct a field investigation on the valley and the mine from a disease prevention perspective and construct a medical facility within Silverash territory.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I will put this person in complete control of the two areas.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Look at the time. The train should be arriving in Karlan right about now. If you two would like to meet the expert, you need only wait a short moment longer.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enough of this nonsense! I have no idea who you hired and what you are planning with this medical charade. However...!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: This so called 'expert' of yours will stay within my sight at all times!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: This is my guest you're talking about, Arctosz.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That's exactly why, Enciodes.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You said the overmining was Gnosis's doing, and I couldn't care less whether that's the case or not.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The way I see it, anyone you hire might as well be another Gnosis. We may be rid of one, but there will always be more.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: You want to leave your men in charge of the place? Fine, but you will have to show me what this expert is capable of.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: If your expert does well, then not only will they be your guest, Enciodes, I vow to welcome them with my warmest hospitality as my own guest.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: What's the matter? You were talking so big. Do you really need so much time to think?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: If everything is as you said, what is there to hesitate about? Or do you mean to tell us this person you hired is indeed another Gnosis, here to do your dirty work again?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: The Paleroches have always been in charge of the Vine-Bear Court's security. Now that I've agreed to turn these lands over to the Court, I cannot be more reassured with the Paleroches looking after them.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That said...
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: A word of advice, Arctosz. You'd best be careful. Entertaining this guest of ours will be no walk in the park.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hah, not a problem. There are no guests we Paleroches cannot 'entertain.'
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: —Let's find out whether this guest is as stiff-necked as you.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Sciurus, I need you to look into this guest.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Having me run your errands again?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I'm not in the mood for your sharp tongue.
attributes.name: Ratatos

attributes.content: Grr.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Monch, Monch!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Monch here.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Get me a car!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Yucatan, go!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Please watch your step, Madame.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Valais... What's your view on all this?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: I'm afraid I'm not capable enough to see Enciodes's intent.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: I don't blame you, but I certainly didn't expect that crafty woman Ratatos to agree to it. I don't get it.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: It's Matriarch Ratatos. I'm sure she has her ideas.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Hmph, all I know is that Silverash brat has to be planning something.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: And he may sound like he has a point, but I will never believe anything he says so easily!
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Tell Gulo to 'invite' Enciodes's guest over. We'll figure out what to do later.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Yessir.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Man, I didn't expect it to start snowing the moment we got off the train.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Doctor, let's wait till it stops before we head up the mountain.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: Okay.;That's some heavy snow.;Snowball fight! Who's in?

attributes.content: This actually isn't so bad. We get snowstorms like this in Kjerag all the time.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Actually, that sounds like fun...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But we still have a long way to go. We should save our strength.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Eh... It's kind of a pain to get to Karlan right now.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I hope the train will take us all the way to the foot of the mountain one day.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: We may call this the Karlan Railway, but there's actually a stretch of distance from the station to the foot of the mountain where we aren't allowed to build anything.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: They still aren't allowed to build anything there?;Sounds like it's going to be difficult, then.

attributes.content: There is a lot of resistance to the idea... I'm not too sure about this stuff, but I don't think it's going to be easy.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: A lot of the people here insist on walking every single step up Mount Karlan, thinking to do otherwise would be unfaithful, but I don't think Kjeragandr would mind.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: We Kjerag folk always keep faith in our hearts. How would taking a train straight to the mountain change any of that?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes has always wanted to have the railway go straight to Karlan.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Alas, the lands up ahead belong to the Paleroches.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Sir Arctosz would never let him build any tracks there.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Half a year ago, there was even a bit of a tussle between General Gulo of the Paleroches and Gnosis.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: With Gnosis?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Oh, right, I haven't heard anything about him for a while. Is he doing okay?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: He... He was fired because of that scuffle.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: One of the reasons Sir Enciodes invited the Doctor here is because he wanted the Doctor to fill his role.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Huh? How come no one told me that?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Doctor, did anyone...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: What's the matter...? Who are you people?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Lady Ensia...! Get behind me!
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: On Sir Arctosz's orders, I'm here to extend the Silverashes' guest, {@nickname}, an invitation to the Arctosz estate.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: You're bringing all these soldiers along to invite OUR guest to your place? What kind of sick joke is this?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: This place belongs to my family, the Silverashes! General Gulo, you may work for the Paleroches, but I suggest you don't do anything out of line.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I see you're here as well, Lady Ensia. You'll have to pardon me for my intrusion.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I'll cut to the chase. Dr. {@nickname} is the Silverashes' guest, and you aren't bringing anyone along on your way home. Not on my watch.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Relax, Lady Ensia. Sir Arctosz only wanted to invite the esteemed guest to pay our humble abode a visit.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: As if my brother would agree to something that unreasonable!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Not to worry, Lady Ensia. Your brother... Sir Enciodes has already given us his approval.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: No way!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It's true.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Also, Lady Ensia, mentioned the ownership of the land here...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: —This isn't Silverash territory anymore.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: From now on, the land belongs to the Vine-Bear Court.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Come again?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Weiss, what's the meaning of this? First, it's the reason the Doctor was invited here. Then, it's the ownership of the lands. What else are you keeping from me?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Sorry, Lady Ensia...
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: Weiss, come on... what's happening?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Which one of you is {@nickname}?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.options: It's me.;It's him.;Definitely ain't me.

attributes.content: The one in the hood... Right, it's you.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: It's me.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Hm? I'm pretty sure I'm looking for someone in a hood...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: No way, it's gotta be you!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: If it's not you, then keep your mouth shut!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Wait, hold on! With that hood... It's gotta be you!
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: ...(Breathes a long sigh)
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: (Easy now.);(Wait.);(Don't make trouble here.)

attributes.content: If you say so...
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Don't move! Hands off your weapons!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior A

attributes.content: Last warning. No funny moves...
attributes.name: Kjerag Warrior B

attributes.content: You don't seem very happy about our arrangement?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Know your place, outsider. Sir Arctosz gave you an 'invitation.' Most people are never so lucky.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: You dare act so impudent, knowing that's an esteemed guest who stands before you?
You hear footsteps accompanied by dull, metallic clanking sounds. An impressively tall woman walks toward you.
Immediately, everything falls silent. The Kjerag soldiers surrounding you put away their weapons and step aside with timid looks on their faces.
She takes a quick glance at all of you, briefly pausing as her gaze lands on the elite operator standing next to you.
The moment their eyes meet, they put their hands on their weapons by pure instinct.
I assume you will do whatever it takes to get this 'Doctor' to pay your visit today?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: We have our orders, and Sir Enciodes gave us his approval... You shouldn't have a problem with that?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Relax. I'm not here for you.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Lady Ensia, Enciodes asked me to escort you home.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Degenbrecher, did my brother really...?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm here to receive our guest for Enciodes, and I've done that now.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.options: And you'll hand me over to these guys right straight away?

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Please, go on.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Looks like Sir Enciodes is so busy that he doesn't have the time to come fetch the Doctor himself?
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Put your weapon down. I would rather not offend our guest's bodyguard in any way.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: It's part of my job to carry a weapon at all times, and you're not my boss.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.options: Enough, Sharp. No bloodshed here.

attributes.content: I'm the Doctor's bodyguard. Wherever the Doctor goes, I go.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: My instructions are to invite the Doctor, and the Doctor alone.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.options: It's okay, Sharp. You go stand by somewhere else.

attributes.content: If you say so...
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.content: Doctor, are you seriously going?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: Don't worry.;This isn't your fault.;Hell yeah. This sounds like fun.

attributes.content: Don't worry? How am I supposed to not worry? And why are you even going along with what they're saying, Doctor?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But if it wasn't for us inviting you in the first place, this wouldn't have happened... Why are you going along with this so easily? I still haven't been told a thing...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Doctor, stop grinning. You're reminding me of my brother... And why are you going along with this? I don't get it...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Gulo.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You'd do well to treat our guest better than that.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Say 'please.'
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Doctor of Rhodes Island... 'Please' follow us to the Paleroche estate.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.options: The Black Knight is so well-mannered.
Three-time champion of the Kazimierz Major.;The Leithanian warrior who needs not use Arts.;Your name still has legs in Kazimierz.

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I'm just Enciodes's bodyguard.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.options: Give him my regards.

attributes.content: I will.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.options: Lead the way.

attributes.content: Looks like I'm working overtime again.
attributes.name: Sharp

attributes.text: At the Tri-Clan Council that just concluded, the Vine-Bear Court and the clans have come to a shocking understanding regarding the Karlan mining question.

To resolve the differences between the families and to better drive Kjerag's development, the clans have all agreed to turn portions of their authority over to the Saintess, in accordance with the teachings of Kjeragandr.
Moreover, the clans have all agreed to fully assist the Saintess in her role as the leader in service of leading Kjerag toward a better tomorrow.\n......

attributes.content: Enciodes!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You're home, Ensia.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You've traveled far, my dear sister.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes, why?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Slow down.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Why did you hand the Doctor over to the Paleroches?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I need the Doctor to carry some of Gnosis's responsibilities for me, and as you know, the relationship between Karlan Trade and the Paleroches has been tense.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Arctosz demanded that the Doctor operate under his supervision, and it's a reasonable ask.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Then why didn't you tell the Doctor?! Not even I knew about this arrangement!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It happened after I had the invitation sent out.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: But still...!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I know Rhodes Island saved you, and I know you think very highly of the Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Trust me, Ensia, I think of the Doctor no less highly than you do.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If the Doctor comes to harm there, the Paleroches will pay the price.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No, Enciodes... I'm not just a Silverash. I'm an employee of Rhodes Island. I have a responsibility to ensure the Doctor's safety.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Leave that to me.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You've grown up, Ensia.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Let's do this, then. Matterhorn.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Have someone keep an eye on what's going happening over there.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As soon as the Doctor begins work in the valleys and mines, you may take Ensia to see the Doctor.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Very good, Sir.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Enciodes!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Go, Ensia. Rest well.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Master, about the Doctor...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Matterhorn, make sure Ensia is safe.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I... I will.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It's useless, you know.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: She isn't the kind of girl we can keep inside the house.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I'll keep an eye on her.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: I need you on standby.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: So be it, then.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Speaking of which, how much do you know about this Doctor of Rhodes Island?
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: An excellent scholar of outstanding professionalism who understands the profits that Rhodes Island will see from working with me.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That the Doctor so quickly got the grasp of the situation and accepted the arrangement shows that I was correct in my assessment. Why do you ask?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I don't think this Doctor is merely a 'scholar.' Great at sniffing things out, no doubt, and much more so than you expected, too.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: And besides, this Doctor sends you regards.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You think the Doctor foresaw all this?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I sensed not a bit of surprise under that hood. Not only did this scholar of yours understand the situation completely, there was never even a hint of astonishment, and I must emphasize that.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: What's more, apparently my reputation precedes me.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: Looks like our friend came prepared.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Trust my intuition, Enciodes. I have an eye for people.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: You might've made yourself an enemy with this move of yours.
attributes.name: Degenbrecher

attributes.content: An enemy?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: No, if the intel I gathered and your description are correct, then the Doctor will become my dearest friend... or should I say, I will become the Doctor's dearest friend?
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes, it's time for your meeting.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.text: Tsk, what's Gnosis doing here? He never showed his face at meetings like this.
Hmph, I heard the one they hired to clean up his mess is finally here. I bet he couldn't bear with the shame any longer and came to beg the boss for mercy.
Haven't you heard? Gnosis's replacement was taken away by the Paleroches. The way I see it, he's here to try his luck, thinking he's still got a chance.
Impossible. There's no chance at all.

attributes.content: Gnosis sits quietly in the conference room.
Everyone sits far away from him, but their gossip echoes through the room, clear as day.
Gnosis, it's been a while. You've lost weight.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Thanks to you, Mr. President.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: We spent four years in Victoria together. It pains me to see things turn out this way.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Enciodes, you've thrown me under the bus already. Let's skip the pleasantries.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Gnosis, you prick, don't you know who you're talking to?!
attributes.name: Mid-level Manager

attributes.content: If it wasn't for your friendship with the president, you wouldn't even be allowed to stand here now that you're sacked!
attributes.name: Mid-level Manager

attributes.content: I don't remember needing anyone's permission to stand here.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: How dare you!
attributes.name: Mid-level Manager

attributes.content: Gnosis, there is no doubt that Karlan Trade owes much to you for its establishment and growth.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: However, whether you have a right to be here or not... that is not for you to say.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Uncle Chester, please.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: First, regarding the sentencing of Karlan Trade's former chief technical officer Gnosis Edelweiss.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: There is no doubt that the expansion of the valleys and mines under Gnosis Edelweiss's management has brought the company tremendous profit.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: But, on the other hand, the rapid expansion strategy and the secret mining of Karlan has brought the company under the repeated scrutiny of the Tri-Clan Council.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: In particular, when the other clans asked to participate in the valley's investigation, Gnosis planned to ambush the two clans' inspection team.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: This has severely damaged Karlan Trade's image and the Silverashes' standing in the Tri-Clan Council.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Therefore, President Enciodes has decided that, effective today, Gnosis Edelweiss will be formally terminated as a Karlan Trade employee.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: So that's why you had me come. You wanted to read all these criticisms you have for me out loud in front of everyone.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Your actions have brought harm to Karlan Trade's profits. This is how I answer our stakeholders. I hope you can understand.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Very well... Enciodes.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I would never have imagined all those years ago when I came to Kjerag to build this place up with you that this is how it would all end.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I am sure both you and I agree that it's far more important to do what's reasonable and beneficial than look back on old times.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That said, I will leave you your lab. You are free to keep using it as soon as any sensitive Karlan Trade data has been removed.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I could also arrange for you to join a caravan heading for Victoria, if that's what you prefer.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: I have to answer to all the stakeholders here. Likewise, I have to give you an answer.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: If you think what you are doing is reasonable, then I feel nothing but disappointment in you.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Karlan Trade yet needs my technology, and Kjerag's industrial sector has not come so far that it can progress without importing core technologies from the outside world.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You promised me a suitably large stage and backed my research, so that we can break new ground in these promising snowlands for the welfare of the people of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: In the end, this is where my stage is, and I am being thrown under the bus for this company.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I still approve of your achievements in academic research, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: That is why, more so than anyone, I'm hoping that you could reflect on what you have done.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: You should never have let things out of my control.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: Hmph, are you so weak now that you're scared of letting anything out of your iron grip?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If that doesn't open my eyes!
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: A loud bang reverberates throughout the room. Gnosis slams the conference room's door shut with enough force that the gust of wind sends paper flying through the air.
Shocked by the sudden thunderclap, the spectators all instinctively look toward the source of the sound before casting their heads down under the invisible pressure.
No one knows just what expression Enciodes holds at this moment.
Let's continue, Chester.
attributes.name: Enciodes

attributes.content: As requested by Sir Arctosz, the leader of Rhodes Island, Dr. {@nickname}, will be in charge of the transfer of the valleys and mines under the protection of the Paleroches.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: We will formally introduce the Doctor to everyone at the company once all the tasks at hand are complete.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Onto our next topic, the meat of our meeting today.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: The preliminary discussions on how to partition the company's power and hand it over to the Saintess.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: First off, on the matter of tariffs...
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: What do I call you, outsider?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.options: {@nickname}.;Call me Doctor.

attributes.content: Funny name.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Valais told me Enciodes's people call you the Doctor. That's what I'll call you.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Doctor? Sounds just like the scholars over at the academy.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Doctor, do you know why you're here?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.options: I don't.

attributes.content: Hmph, Enciodes wants you to take Gnosis's place, but I don't trust his people. That's why I'm keeping my eye on you.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.options: I didn't know that was part of my job description.;Enciodes didn't fill me in on the details...;I'm just here on vacation. You got the wrong person, I'm telling you.

attributes.content: Sir, I'm pretty sure we got a smartass playing dumb here.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Hmph, you're Enciodes's 'guest.' Even if you really don't know a thing, you're still Enciodes's people.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hmph, I invited you here because I didn't want him to fill you in on anything.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Please stop playing dumb.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Considering Sir Enciodes invited you now, of all times, no one will believe that you came to Kjerag for mere sightseeing.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Valais, tell our guest the deal.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Sir Enciodes has decided to transfer the valley and the mines to the Vine-Bear Court. The man who was in charge of the mines and the factory was his subordinate, Gnosis.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: And ever since Gnosis was dismissed, the coordinator position has been left vacant.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: According to Sir Enciodes, you are his replacement.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Looks like you have a clear understanding of the situation now.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Until I am sure that Enciodes isn't making any funny moves in the mines and the valleys, you aren't leaving this place.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Don't you even think about pulling any tricks yourself. My men don't care about etiquette nearly as much as Enciodes's people.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: If they want your head, there's nothing I can do to stop them.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Hah, boss, look at this squirt. I wouldn't know where to chop if I were to try my blade on this midget.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Hahahahaha!
attributes.name: Kjerag Warriors

attributes.content: Hmph, shut up, all of you. I'm not going to make things too hard for you, outsider.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: In the end, you're Enciodes's guest. As long as you play along, we won't do anything to you.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Am I making myself clear?
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.options: I'm not worried. All of you look like reasonable people to me.

attributes.content: Enough, Valais. Show our guest to the bedroom.
attributes.name: Arctosz

attributes.content: Very good, Sir.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: Enya, I'm coming in.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I knew it... You're still sleeping.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Enya. Enya, rise and shine.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Uhh.... Huh?
attributes.name: Sleepyhead Enya

attributes.content: Morn.
attributes.name: Sleepyhead Enya

attributes.content: After a brief fuss, Enya gets dressed and sits in front of her dressing table. Kjarr naturally stands behind her and combs her hair.
*Sigh*...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What's the matter now?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You know.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Isn't it a good thing to become leader of all three clans?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You always say that, in the Vine-Bear Court, your role is simply to keep the masses calm, and most of the time, it's actually the Great Elder who calls the shots.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: This is an opportunity.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I wouldn't be so worried if it had been Arctosz or even Ratatos who brought up the idea.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But it was Enciodes who made that proposal.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Perhaps the guilt's suddenly gotten to him?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: I sure hope so.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But if you're so worried about this, couldn't you have turned it down?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Didn't you agree to it without thinking twice?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: That's because there wasn't a point to dragging it out.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: No one had any grounds to object.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It doesn't matter whether he really wants me to be Kjerag's leader. There wasn't anyone who could reject the proposal then and there.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And if we had set the issue aside, more people would've found out.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You told me that the masses have gotten used to peace, just like they've gotten used to the endless snow on the mountains.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: The people of Kjerag wish for peace first and foremost, and they gravitate toward those who can bring them peace.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Right, peace. Whether it's the peace that Enciodes brought them or the peace that the Vine-Bear Court brought.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: That's why, even if I turned down the offer, the people would've asked me to accept.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: So I might as well take the initiative myself before the Great Elder makes all the arrangements.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You think Enciodes foresaw that?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: He made a proposal that no one could refuse. Under normal circumstances, he would've been the last person to suggest this.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I am sure both Arctosz and Ratatos thought the same thing.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I can see why Arctosz went along with it, but Ratatos... She was never the kind of person to give up easily.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: What a headache. I really hope Kjeragandr will hear my prayers and teach the Great Elder and the three clan leaders a good lesson.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Perhaps She has already heard your prayers, and it just isn't time yet.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Do you want Her to take care of Enciodes too?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: For him, as cruel as possible.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Pff.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Now let's put this necklace on you... and we're done!
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Mmhmm.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Right, would you give this letter and scarf to Ensia? Also...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Ask her to come pay the mountain a visit, right?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: You know me well.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Hehe.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Also, send the word out that I'll be analyzing scriptures today, and I don't want to be disturbed.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I... I need some time to think.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: After Kjarr leaves the room, Enya opens her drawer to see an exquisitely decorated base, holding an eye-catching, elegant rock.
O Kjeragandr, please guide me. What should I do?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: We no longer live in times where isolation is enough to keep ourselves out of the affairs around us.
In the past hundred years, there have been countless exchanges and conflicts between nations. Columbia rose quickly in a conflict, while Gaul, a powerful country, was also wiped out in a conflict.
All the world's nations are slowly changing in these times separated by Catastrophes. Refusing relations with others is no longer an option.
Kjerag cannot continue to lock itself away on these snowy mounts. Kjeragandr's protection—if Kjeragandr really exists in the first place—can bring the Snow Realm this far.
If we are to go any further, Kjerag must grow stronger than ever before.
The millennium of peace and quiet has reached its end, and we cannot wait for others to open the door for us.
Kjerag needs to make contact with the outside world. We must take that step forward while we still have control. That's the Silverash tradition.
Kjerag must remain Kjerag. We still have a chance, but time grows short for the snowy mountains.
I have seen our world... I have to make a difference. Everything I've witnessed needs to have meaning.
So you are Gnosis.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Do you know who I am?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sciurus Browntail, sister of the Browntail clan matriarch, Ratatos Browntail.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You know that, and you have the balls to forgo a salute?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Why must I salute someone whom I have nothing to do with?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: You! Don't you know your manners?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: If we must talk manners, you should work on yours first, Sciurus Browntail.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I heard all your commotion outside the door. What's more, when nobles meet, they must each first curtsey to each other with a Karlan bow.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: If you show up here without affording me any courtesy, why should I show you any?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: J-Just how outdated is your idea of etiquette?!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Etiquette never dies. It's only slowly forgotten. As a noble, you should feel sorrow in that.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The Edelweisses have long been in charge of the management of Kjerag's texts and records. I admire your knowledge of Kjerag etiquette, Mr. Gnosis.
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Still though, I'm afraid Madame Sciurus isn't here to discuss Kjerag etiquette. Could we please move on to the main topic?
attributes.name: Yucatan

attributes.content: Very well. I'm curious. Considering Ratatos refused my capitulation, why is she now reaching out to me?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Hmph, do you have to ask?! It's because your master proposed handing his powers over to the Saintess at the Tri-Clan Council!
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I see. In that case...
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Go home and tell Ratatos. Now that things have come to this, I am likely not the only one who will cooperate, given the right amount of sincerity.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Per Sir Arctosz's orders, please stay here while you are not attending to your duties.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: If you need to head outside, we will serve as your bodyguards. Kjerag may be a safe place, but we cannot guarantee no one will take the chance to cause trouble.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: You will be served the finest delicacies that Kjerag has to offer. You may also use anything here as you see fit. All your daily needs will be met during your stay with us.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.content: If you require anything, please let the servants know. You may also have them relay anything to me.
attributes.name: Valais

attributes.options: Very well. I look forward to dinner.
(Keeping an eye on me whenever I head out, huh...?)

attributes.content: Oripathy consultation... and the Grand Ceremony... Are those the only reasons my brother is inviting you to the Snow Realm?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Oh, the Grand Ceremony takes place annually in Kjerag. It's the biggest ecent, and the most important thing to the Kjerag people.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: On that day, everyone in Kjerag stops what they're doing and offers Kjeragandr, the goddess of our mountains, our most sincere prayers.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: We pray for a happy, peaceful year under our mountain goddess's protection.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: As for the Oripathy problem, Kjerag didn't have many Infected in the past, so most of us don't know much about Oripathy. In the Snow Realms, Oripathy is far from the greatest threat we face.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But ever since my brother got the mountains connected by railway, we've been getting more and more visitors, and life has also gotten much better. Thanks to that, everyone's starting to learn more about the Infected and Oripathy.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I guess Oripathy's stepping into the limelight since there are no other pressing issues.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Kjerag still doesn't have any professional means to test for Oripathy, let alone helping the Infected get settled and get treatment.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Given the situation, you might be the best consultant they can get.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Doctor, are you going to accept the invitation?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: That's not something I can decide all by myself.;......;Do you want me to?

attributes.content: Right, you have a lot on your plate right now, but still...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I know it's not easy to make a decision when this invitation came out of nowhere, but still...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Personally, I really want you to go.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: My parents died in an accident when I was still a kid...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: And after they died, my brother, Enciodes, took over their business to support the family.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: He kept us afloat all by himself until I came of age. Then, to ensure our family's future, he left Kjerag to study in Victoria.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Our family was already on pretty shaky ground before he left Kjerag, and that was around when he started getting more and more headstrong...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But at least we all still got along well as siblings.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But things changed ever since he came back and started Karlan Trade.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Both my brother and sister treated me very well, but, for some reason, the two of them started talking less, and their relationship soured.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Five years ago, when the last Saintess passed away, my sister joined the trials and became the new Kjerag Saintess.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: She's rarely left Mount Karlan since, and I haven't had a lot of chances to see her. We only write to each other now.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: And ever since she became the Saintess, it feels like my brother's often at odds with her...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I may be very good at mountain climbing, but I wouldn't know where to start to mend relationships.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But you're really amazing, Doctor. You get along with everyone, and you've solved a lot of problems for people.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: That's why I was thinking that... if we ever had the chance, maybe you could help me come up with ideas...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: But?

attributes.content: Doctor, I guess this might seem weird coming from me...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But I know my brother better than anyone else. He's amazing, but he's the kind of person who doesn't mind doing whatever it takes to achieve his goals.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I'm actually a little worried that you'll end up becoming a pawn in his game, if you go.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: So that's why it's okay if you don't want to!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.options: I'll bear with it for the now.

attributes.content: That's why I told you you should've gotten out while you still could.
Look at you now. You're caught.

attributes.options: Are you the one who talked to me at the market?;......;You knew this would happen?

attributes.content: Exactly.
Huh? You can hear me, right?
Hey, listen!
I could ask you the same, calm outsider.
The entire time you've been here, you haven't even showed the tiniest bit of worry. Did you know this was going to happen?

attributes.options: What should I call you?

attributes.content: Call me Kjera.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: I changed my mind. I want to be friends with you.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Would you like to be friends with me?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.options: I don't make friends with shady people.;Maybe show yourself first.;Why don't you tell me what this talking rock is all about first?

attributes.content: Don't you think it's better for me to maintain a mysterious aura?
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Sorry, I'm writing a letter to somebody else right now, so I can't go anywhere. Perhaps another time.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Hmm... That's classified information!
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: Well, I don't really have so much time to keep bothering you, if you really don't want to talk.
attributes.name: Kjera

attributes.content: But it's not so bad to have somebody to talk to, don't you think?
attributes.name: Kjera
